attributes.action: Forcibly Make water Companies responsible For the Supply of Drinking Water to homes and for that water supply to contain Fluoride in solution to help slow down the mean rate of National Tooth Decay overriding the power of objectionable individuals for the benefit of National health.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Department of Health asserts that water fluoridation is the most cost-effective means of reducing tooth decay.

The American Dental Associaton claims that fluoride, when ingegrated, systemically prevents tooth decay while teeth develop, and topically when applied to mature teeth. Fluoride is said to strengthen teeth and make them decay-resistant as it is absorbed onto the surface of teeth: enamel is made less soluble, plaque organisms reduce their ability to produce acid, and tooth enamel undergoes remineralisation in areas where acids have demineralised it. 

In short, we want to reduce national levels of dental decay nationwide. fluroide in our drinking water can do just that. think of our children, especially, who would benifit with stronger healthier teeth if this petition  becomes law.
